SELECT ap.plane_id,ap.airline,at.start_airport,at.end_airport, at.start_time, at.end_time, TO_CHAR(at.start_time,'HH24:MI') start_hour, TO_CHAR(at.end_time,'HH24:MI') end_hour, 0||ROUND((end_time-start_time)*24*60/60)||'시간 0'||MOD(ROUND((end_time-start_time)*24*60),60)||'분' totaltime, price ,seattype,img FROM airplane ap JOIN air_time at ON ap.plane_id=at.plane_id INNER JOIN air_seat ae ON ap.plane_id=ae.plane_id INNER JOIN airline_img al ON ap.airline=al.airline WHERE (at.start_airport=#{start_airport} AND at.end_airport=#{end_airport}) AND TO_CHAR(at.start_time)=#{start_time}

SELECT ap.plane_id,ap.airline,at.start_airport,at.end_airport, at.start_time, at.end_time, TO_CHAR(at.start_time,'HH24:MI') start_hour, TO_CHAR(at.end_time,'HH24:MI') end_hour, 0||ROUND((end_time-start_time)*24*60/60)||'시간 0'||MOD(ROUND((end_time-start_time)*24*60),60)||'분' totaltime, price ,seattype,img FROM airplane ap JOIN air_time at ON ap.plane_id=at.plane_id INNER JOIN air_seat ae ON ap.plane_id=ae.plane_id INNER JOIN airline_img al ON ap.airline=al.airline WHERE (at.start_airport=#{start_airport} AND at.end_airport=#{end_airport}) AND TO_CHAR(at.end_time)=#{end_time}

GROUP BY ap.plane_id,ap.airline,at.start_airport,at.end_airport, at.start_time, at.end_time, TO_CHAR(at.start_time,'HH24:MI'), TO_CHAR(at.end_time,'HH24:MI'), 0||ROUND((end_time-start_time)*24*60/60)||':0'||MOD(ROUND((end_time-start_time)*24*60),60), price ,seattype,img
